mapper.select: select * from v_curriculum where v_curriculum.TeacherJobID = #{TeacherJobID,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by weekday ,SECTION ASC

SELECT * FROM v_curriculum vc LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.CurriculumId CurriculumId1 ,c.QrcodeInfo FROM yw_classroom c WHERE date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN date_format(c.StratTime, '%Y%m%d')AND date_format(c.EndTime, '%Y%m%d') ) as v on vc.CurriculumId=v.CurriculumId1 WHERE vc.TeacherJobID =#{0} and vc.WeekDay =#{1}
SELECT * FROM v_curriculum WHERE v_curriculum.TeacherJobID = #{0} AND v_curriculum.WeekDay = #{1} AND v_curriculum.Section= #{2}

SELECT V.*,A.RecordDateTime,a.ClassRoomId,a.CurriculumId FROM (SELECT S.StudentNumber,S.StudentName,S.Sex FROM yw_students S ,yw_curriculum c WHERE S.ClassID = c.CourseID AND c.curriculumId=#{0} ) V LEFT JOIN yw_attendance A ON A.StudentNumber=V.StudentNumber AND A.ClassRoomId=#{1}

SELECT C.ClassRoomId,c.CurriculumId,c.QrcodeInfo FROM yw_classroom c WHERE date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN date_format(c.StratTime, '%Y%m%d') AND date_format(c.EndTime, '%Y%m%d') AND c.CurriculumId=#{0}
